title: Create an Account
summary: A user needs to be able to create an account
description: The user should be able to create an account on our pages. With this account he is also able to give the needed information about himself.

title: Login to an account
summary: A user needs to be able to login with his account
description: The user should be able to login to his account on our pages. With this account he is also able to give the needed information about himself.

title: Start a new game
summary: A user is able to start a new single game

title: Play a single game
summary: The user is able to play a game
description: This includes reading the question in a specific language and giving an answer.

title: See results of a game
summary: The user is able to see the results
description: It includes a result of points and also the wrong answers together with the correct ones.

title: Select a multiplayer game
summary: The user is able to select a multiplayer game

title: Invite other to game
summary: The user is able to invite others to a game

title: Play a multiplayer game
summary: The user is able to play the multiplayer game with others
description: This includes giving an answer and seeing also the result afterwards.

title: Chat in multiplayer game
summary: The user is able to chat with other players

title: Storyline walkthrough
summary: The user is able to walk through a storyline
description: The user should be able to read one of the storylines and walk through it.

title: Read a story
summary: The user is able to read a story
description: The user should be able to read a story and also give an answer to the question.

title: Storyline results
summary: The user is able to see the results
description: The user should be able to see the results which he got when he went through the storyline.
